about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm a Python backend developer with a strong foundation in mathematics, problem-solving, and software architecture. I've built APIs, data processing pipelines, and automation tools, working with frameworks like Django and FastAPI.


My experience spans freelance projects, personal applications, and collaborative development. I enjoy learning new technologies — from modern frontend tools like React to infrastructure-as-code with Terraform — and I'm always exploring ways to improve my craft.


Outside of coding, I love chess, trivia, and exploring the history of science and technology.
